description: DevTeam declarative hooks configuration — includes command, prompt, and agent hook types

hooks.description: Validate tool calls, check iteration limits, circuit breaker

hooks.prompt: The agent is about to modify a file. Check if this modification is within the current task scope. The task scope should be defined in the agent's prompt context. If the file being modified is clearly unrelated to the task (e.g., modifying auth code when the task is about UI styling), return ok:false with a reason. If it's reasonable, return ok:true.
hooks.description: LLM-based scope pre-check — catches obvious scope violations before they happen
Validate bash commands, check for dangerous operations
Detect quality gate results from bash output

hooks.prompt: Analyze the bash command output. Determine if this was a test run, lint check, type check, or security scan. Extract structured results: what passed, what failed, error messages. Write results to SQLite via: source scripts/events.sh && log_event 'gate_result' 'quality' '<message>' '<json_data>'
hooks.description: Agent-based quality gate analysis — replaces fragile regex parsing
Block exit unless EXIT_SIGNAL:true or quality gates pass
Track agent start time for cost tracking
Track agent completion for cost tracking and metrics

hooks.command: bash -c 'source scripts/events.sh 2>/dev/null && log_event "task_completed" "orchestration" "Task marked complete" "{}" 2>/dev/null || true'
hooks.description: Log task completion — triggers downstream task assignment in Agent Teams mode

hooks.command: bash -c 'source scripts/events.sh 2>/dev/null && log_event "worktree_created" "infrastructure" "Git worktree created" "{}" 2>/dev/null || true'
hooks.description: Track worktree creation for parallel track management

hooks.command: bash -c 'source scripts/events.sh 2>/dev/null && log_event "worktree_removed" "infrastructure" "Git worktree removed" "{}" 2>/dev/null || true'
hooks.description: Track worktree removal for cleanup verification

hooks.prompt: A teammate agent has gone idle. Check if there are remaining tasks in the shared task list that this teammate could work on. If yes, return ok:false with reason 'Assign next task from backlog'. If all tasks are complete or claimed, return ok:true.
hooks.description: Prevent teammates from going idle when work remains
Save state to SQLite before context compaction
Initialize or resume session in SQLite
Detect and prevent abandonment during autonomous execution
